text: Nicolás Álvarez (; born 8 June 1996) is a Peruvian tennis player. On the junior tour, Álvarez has a career high ITF junior ranking of 17 achieved in March 2014. Álvarez has a career high ATP singles ranking of 295 achieved on January 6th 2020. He also has a career high ATP doubles ranking of 345, achieved on March 2nd 2020. Álvarez has represented Peru at Davis Cup. In Davis Cup he has a win-loss record of 6-5. ==Future and Challenger finals== ===Singles: 8 (4–4)=== {|class=wikitable style=font-size:97% |- !Legend |- style="background:moccasin;" |Challengers 0
